posts.post_title: FS/FT: Large Group of Raw OJs
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric
Here is a large lot of raw OJs that I have available.

These are for sale/trade (I need E91, E90-2, E95 or N28 (glasscock))

Phenomenal Smith - Athletics - trimmed - $110
Mike Mattimore - Athletics - skinned/trimmed - $90
Tommy Foghorn Tucker - Baltimore - trimmed/rebacked - $100
